title: A Phase II Pharmacodynamic Investigation of the Efficacy of Vorinostat to Induce Fetal Hemoglobin in Adults With Severe Sickle Cell Disease Who Have Not Benefitted From Prior Therapy

History of priapism

History of avascular necrosis

18 years of age or older

Non-hematologic laboratory values as outlined in the protocol

Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Subjects with hemoglobin SC or SB+ thalassemia

History of malignancy

Subjects who have received any HDAC inhibitors other than valproic acid
